DOC.brief_summary: This protocol phase 1 , randomize , single-blinded study evaluate safety tolerability single 5 mcg dose GLA-SE administer intramuscularly GLA-AF administer subcutaneously . The second focus detail global immune response measure systemic cytokine , chemokines , global gene regulation . The third focus investigate effect GLA peripheral blood immune cell include monocyte dendritic cell . The result trial generate supportive human data use GLA adjuvant dendritic cell-targeted vaccine strategy .
